synopsis.text:
When Negi Springfield, a prodigious 10-year-old magician-in-training, embarks on his final exam to become a Magister Magi, he finds himself in a peculiar situation: appointed as the new homeroom teacher for the all-girls Mahora Academy's class 2-A. In this unconventional classroom setting, Negi must navigate the challenges of teaching and maintaining his secret magical identity while dealing with a diverse group of older students, who find their new pint-sized teacher utterly adorable.

As Negi tries to prove his worth as an educator and a magician, he inadvertently alienates one of his students, Asuna Kagurazaka, by replacing her beloved former teacher. To make matters worse, Asuna discovers Negi's magical secret and threatens to expose him unless he helps her with her problems.

As the academic year unfolds, Negi and Asuna form an unlikely alliance, facing various challenges together, from combating dark magical forces to helping their classmates pass exams. With his magical abilities and unwavering determination, Negi strives to become the best teacher he can be while working towards his ultimate goal of becoming a Magister Magi.
